channel.title: Login Details
channel.description:
Well, im more of a server side coder and dont have very much exp in clients. But...... How do I make it so when you open your client you have the owner login details there? So eg.
I open my client. My username and password is already there. I can just click login without typing anything.
What class is it in?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 06:19:03 pm[/size][hr]Worked it out. Lock please
